Spirit and Chaos is an artistic biopic of Miyazawa Kenji, a Japanese poet and writer who was active in the early 20th century. The movie is divided into two parts: "Early Years" and "Adult Years". A woman who hates cats (Alice Krige) and her son (Brian Krause) have moved into a small town, and must deal with a mean cat. The cat, left to fend for itself when its owners move away, has taken to killing the local pets, and killing Alice. In this movie, Alice’s son, Adam, and local policewoman Kathie Peil, track a demon that resides within the cat; the cat eating the animal’s heart
